location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Parts of 'Iraq and Kuwait - Turkey in Asia'

mods.abstract: The map shows the area of Southern Iraq around Zubair and Basra. The map indicates hydrology (of the Euphrates River), settlements, roads, vegetation and provides some indication of relief.Published by the General Staff India under the direction of Colonel Sir S G Burrard, KCSI, RE, FRS, Surveyor General of India, 1916.
